"Oh, Master. How do you do...": "...I do apologize. I was recalling your magnificent appearance when you fought as an Etoile, and became lost in thought."

"I simply cannot get the image out of my head. Perhaps if I saw it again...
Would you oblige, Master?"
"I would greatly appreciate another demonstration. Just as the name \"Etoile\" suggests, go forth and shine like glittering stardust!"
